CustomField.description: Defines if validation will occur within the Timesheet Manager to ensure the sum of the Quantity of Transactions with a Record Type of Timesheet Entry matches the Timesheets Total Hours. This is to prevent additional hours being added via Pay Transactions without a corresponding Timesheet Entry. When True, the validation will occur.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if validation will occur within the Timesheet Manager to ensure the sum of the Quantity of Transactions with a Record Type of Timesheet Entry matches the Timesheets Total Hours. When True, the validation will occur.
CustomField.label: Validated Transaction Total in TSM
